scripts.test:build: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.test-ai-single: node -e "const tester = require('./ai-accuracy-tester.js'); const t = new tester(); t.loadTestScenarios().then(() => { const scenario = Array.from(t.scenarios.values()).find(s => s.name === process.argv[1]); if (scenario) t.runTestScenario(scenario); else console.log('Scenario not found'); })"
